name: This Is What The End Of The World Sounds Like
name_original: This Is What The End Of The World Sounds Like
description:
After a year living every day obsessed with We Are But Worms: A One Word RPG by Riverhouse Games, my own one word RPG appeared to me in a dream.

This Is What The End Of The World Sounds Like can now be played for free by you any time you like. I have personally played it while driving on the highway, scrolling through twitter, relaxing in the shower, while falling asleep, and at the grocery store among other places.

Enjoy.
